Misfortune Hex: R30' Target suffers worse of 2 rolls on all ability checks, attack, saves, and skill checks (DC 21 Will neg) for 3 rd 1/target/dy
Nightmares Hex: R60' May use Nightmare effects (DC 21 Will ends)
Patron: Knows additional spells
Retribution Hex: R60' Target suffers half of damage it inflicts (DC 21 Will neg) for 1 rd
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Slumber Hex: R30' May use Sleep effects w/out HD limit (DC 21 Will neg) for 20 rd 1/target/dy
